Analyze the Crimes in San Francisco

Overview- Crime History (move mouse to an area, the type of crime will appear. Color correlates with counts.)
Crime-Time View
The number of crimes (in a specific type) over the day of week.
Crime-Location View (Move mouse to an area, counts appear. Color correlates with crime counts)
